DOC.brief_summary: To compare number pass require cellblock acquisition without suction use 25g needle .
DOC.criteria: All patient refer UAB Endoscopy Unit assessment pancreatic mass lesion require FNA . Age < 19 year Unable safely undergo EUS reason Coagulopathy ( INR > 1.6 , Prothrombin Time > 18 sec , Thrombocytopenia < 80,000 cells/ml ) Unable consent NonEnglish speaking patient
